content:
# OwnSpace 
 Repository for the OwnSpace mobile application in React Native.

Project developed for the 2019/2020 DSMC course, during my licence in the training center CCI Campus Colmar.

 Made by [Jean-Thavorak Phe](https://jtphe.ddns.net)
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "main": "node_modules/expo/AppEntry.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "expo start",
    "android": "expo start --android",
    "ios": "expo start --ios",
    "web": "expo start --web",
    "eject": "expo eject"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@aws-amplify/api": "^2.1.6",
    "@aws-amplify/pubsub": "^3.0.7",
    "@react-native-community/eslint-config": "^1.0.0",
    "@react-native-community/masked-view": "0.1.10",
    "@react-native-community/netinfo": "^5.6.2",
    "@react-navigation/native": "^5.1.7",
    "@use-expo/font": "^2.0.0",
    "aws-amplify": "^2.2.6",
    "aws-amplify-react-native": "^3.2.2",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-react-plugin": "^1.0.1",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "expo": "~36.0.0",
    "expo-localization": "~8.1.0",
    "i18n-js": "^3.5.1",
    "immutability-helper": "^3.0.2",
    "qrcode.react": "^1.0.0",
    "react": "~16.13.1",
    "react-dom": "~16.9.0",
    "react-i18next": "^11.3.3",
    "react-native": "https://github.com/expo/react-native/archive/sdk-36.0.0.tar.gz",
    "react-native-gesture-handler": "~1.6.1",
    "react-native-iphone-x-helper": "^1.2.1",
    "react-native-paper": "^3.8.0",
    "react-native-popup-menu": "^0.15.7",
    "react-native-reanimated": "~1.4.0",
    "react-native-root-toast": "^3.2.0",
    "react-native-router-flux": "^4.2.0",
    "react-native-safe-area-context": "0.6.0",
    "react-native-screens": "2.0.0-alpha.12",
    "react-native-vector-icons": "^6.6.0",
    "react-redux": "^7.2.0",
    "redux": "^4.0.5",
    "redux-persist": "^6.0.0",
    "redux-persist-expo-filesystem": "^2.0.0",
    "redux-saga": "^1.1.3",
    "reselect": "^4.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.0.0",
    "babel-preset-expo": "~8.1.0",
    "eslint": "^6.8.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^18.1.0",
    "eslint-config-node": "^4.0.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^6.11.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.20.2",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.2.3",
    "eslint-plugin-node": "^11.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^3.1.3",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.19.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^2.5.1",
    "prettier": "^1.19.1",
    "reactotron-react-native": "^5.0.0",
    "reactotron-redux": "^3.1.3"
  },
  "private": true
}
